tool_description: GeoStockPhoto is a stock photo agency with high-quality photos from all around the world. Each photo is geotagged with latitude and longitude. All registered users can interact with our database and retrieve information of all photos on sale.
name: GeoStockPhoto
title: GeoStockPhoto

api_list.name: photo/getInfo
api_list.description: Returns the descriptive information of a photo.

api_list.name: photo/getConfSize
api_list.description: Returns the list of all sizes that any photo can have on GeoStockPhoto.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://geostockphoto.p.rapidapi.com/photo/getConfSize"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "geostockphoto.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: photo/getConfCategory
api_list.description: Returns the list of all categories that any photo can have on GeoStockPhoto.

api_list.name: photo/getSearch
api_list.description: Returns the photos available for sales with full search capabilities.

optional_parameters.name: idCategory
optional_parameters.description: Search by category of the photos. You can retrieve the possible categories by using the method getConfCategory.

optional_parameters.name: idSize
optional_parameters.description: Search by minimum dimension of the photos. You can retrieve the possilbe dimensions by using the method getConfSize.

optional_parameters.name: lat_NE
optional_parameters.description: Latitude of the North-East corner of the geographical region you want to search the photos.

optional_parameters.name: lat_SW
optional_parameters.description: Latitude of the South-West corner of the geographical region you want to search the photos.

optional_parameters.name: lng_NE
optional_parameters.description: Longitude of the North-East corner of the geographical region you want to search the photos.

optional_parameters.name: lng_SW
optional_parameters.description: Longitude of the South-West corner of the geographical region you want to search the photos.

optional_parameters.name: rate
optional_parameters.description: Search by minimum rate of the photos.

optional_parameters.name: thumb
optional_parameters.description: 3 options: '120', '430' or 'circle' in order to get the source of the 120px, 430px or the circle thumb.

optional_parameters.name: user
optional_parameters.description: Search by author of the photos.
